item.title: Xiaomi Redmi note 8
item.dc:creator: Parvej
item.content:encoded:
The WIWU Pencil Pro Stylus is a high-performance stylus designed to deliver an enhanced and seamless experience for iPad users, whether for drawing, writing, or gaming. With its advanced features and precision engineering, this stylus is an excellent choice for both professionals and casual users.

Tilt Sensitivity:

The tilt sensitivity feature allows you to create varied lines and shadows by adjusting the angle of the stylus. This makes the pen ideal for artists and designers who require precision and flexibility in their work.

Palm Rejection Technology:

With palm rejection technology, you can rest your hand comfortably on the screen while writing or drawing, without worrying about accidental marks or input interference. This ensures a natural and fluid writing experience, without the need for gloves.

No Bluetooth or App Required:

The WIWU Pencil Pro pairs easily with your device without needing Bluetooth or additional apps. Simply tap the cap button once to turn it on/off, and it will automatically connect to your iPad, providing instant functionality.
item.excerpt:encoded: Made from carbon fiber, the body of the pencil is both lightweight and durable, offering enhanced sensitivity and more accurate performance compared to ordinary stylus pens. The material also contributes to the overall sleek design of the pen.

item.title: Universal travel adapters
item.dc:creator: Parvej
item.content:encoded:
The WIWU Pencil Pro Stylus is a high-performance stylus designed to deliver an enhanced and seamless experience for iPad users, whether for drawing, writing, or gaming. With its advanced features and precision engineering, this stylus is an excellent choice for both professionals and casual users.

Tilt Sensitivity:

The tilt sensitivity feature allows you to create varied lines and shadows by adjusting the angle of the stylus. This makes the pen ideal for artists and designers who require precision and flexibility in their work.

Palm Rejection Technology:

With palm rejection technology, you can rest your hand comfortably on the screen while writing or drawing, without worrying about accidental marks or input interference. This ensures a natural and fluid writing experience, without the need for gloves.

No Bluetooth or App Required:

The WIWU Pencil Pro pairs easily with your device without needing Bluetooth or additional apps. Simply tap the cap button once to turn it on/off, and it will automatically connect to your iPad, providing instant functionality.
item.excerpt:encoded: Made from carbon fiber, the body of the pencil is both lightweight and durable, offering enhanced sensitivity and more accurate performance compared to ordinary stylus pens. The material also contributes to the overall sleek design of the pen.
